<li><a href="http://www.leedstrinity.ac.uk/cfj/docs/APPLICATIONFORM.doc">MA/PG diploma in Bi-Media (Radio and TV), Radio or   Print Journalism
Diploma in Bi-Media, Radio or Print Journalism applicants
Applications for PGCE courses are through the Graduate Teacher Training Registry (GTTR).
All the help you need is on the site, but if you are still on your degree course at university or college, advice will be available from your tutor or a careers advisor.

As part of the process, you pay for the application online using a credit card or debit card. You should also be aware that you will need to provide details of your referee (who must be able to supply a reference electronically).
Also, you will be responsible for sending the completed application online to GTTR. Advice and information about the process is available at www.gttr.ac.uk.
Where part-time study is offered (not available for PGCE),
it is normally available only if you are unable to attend
appropriate faculty or course director or visit our <a href="http://www.leedstrinity.ac.uk/postgraduate">postgraduate
